name: HECK support
description:
Dearest EMPLOYEE NAME HERE, I come to you under dire circumstance.

I have received word that, as of today, our ambiguous-product production is at an all-time low. We fear this may be your fault. Your fellow co-workers are cramming themselves into the halls to form an oddly organized line converging on your cubicle workstation. Solve at least 75% or more of their requests for the following 3 days and you will not be terminated. Failure to address this request will result in immediate termination (and also DEATH.)

Sincerest many love thanks,

This project iswas for the Brackeys Game Jam.

I was unable to form a concrete gameplay element for the game, and the amount of assets I am unable to create on my own made it impossible for me alone to do in 7 days with my current set of skills and tools. Unreal is not a 2D engine. The fate of the project is unknown.

Local Forecast - Slower by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/3988-local-forecast---slower
